ygData.subject: Council Election Results!
ygData.msgSnippet: This post is partly an experiment to see if nbwrpg.com email works :-) Ok, as everyone probably knows, the election has been going for a few days now. Today

Subject: Council Election Results!

From: Zardus@...

This post is partly an experiment to see if nbwrpg.com email works :-)

Ok, as everyone probably knows, the election has been going for a few days
now. Today was the final day, but three winners havn't been decided
yet.

The results of the last poll were:

rAuq@...		4
Rfa007@... 	3
Rudra656@... 	3
KSLawdogg@... 	3
Icedemon101@...	2
TMRattrap@...	4
Alloran2@...	3
Kinger01030@...	2

Quite a few of you are probably staring at the screen with jaws dropping
about now. And yeah, I'm surprised too.

Anyways, only two people made it onto the council for now (Megan and rAuq,
you can stop worrying now). As you can all probably see, third place was a
tie between Robo, Rudra, KSL, and Alloran. I put up a Council Election
(Round 2) poll featuring those four people as the four options. This poll
is only going to go on for 1 day, so everyone get your votes in
quickly. Tomorrow evening we should have the third person elected, and
then we can get on with all this.

The first poll is still up, but if you try to vote at it, you'll get an
error. That poll's been closed, its just there so people can view the
results.
